DelegatedWork.adminDescription: Read the members of teams, on behalf of the signed-in user.
DelegatedWork.userDescription: Read the members of teams, on your behalf.

Application.adminDisplayName: Read the members of all teams
Application.adminDescription: Read the members of all teams, without a signed-in user.

DelegatedWork.adminDisplayName: Add and remove members from teams
DelegatedWork.adminDescription: Add and remove members from teams, on behalf of the signed-in user. Also allows changing a member's role, for example from owner to non-owner.
DelegatedWork.userDisplayName: Add and remove members from teams and channels
DelegatedWork.userDescription: Add and remove members from teams, on your behalf. Also allows changing a member's role, for example from owner to non-owner.

Application.adminDisplayName: Add and remove members from all teams
Application.adminDescription: Add and remove members from all teams, without a signed-in user. Also allows changing a team member's role, for example from owner to non-owner.

DelegatedWork.adminDisplayName: Add and remove members with non-owner role for all teams
DelegatedWork.adminDescription: Add and remove members from all teams, on behalf of the signed-in user. Does not allow adding or removing a member with the owner role. Additionally, does not allow the app to elevate an existing member to the owner role.
DelegatedWork.userDisplayName: Add and remove members with non-owner role for all teams
DelegatedWork.userDescription: Add and remove members from all teams, on your behalf. Does not allow adding or removing a member with the owner role. Additionally, does not allow the app to elevate an existing member to the owner role.

Application.adminDisplayName: Add and remove members with non-owner role for all teams
Application.adminDescription: Add and remove members from all teams, without a signed-in user. Does not allow adding or removing a member with the owner role. Additionally, does not allow the app to elevate an existing member to the owner role.
